content: So that's what a meteor shower sounds like... It's almost like — {A豆豆眼}someone's belly rumbling?
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A加油}How about we head out to the Starsea when we get the chance? There are bound to be big discoveries waiting for us! I'm already fired up for the next new route — Kula bata!
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: *ahem* What I meant was... I heard a stomach growling. So I made a wish on a shooting star... for some delicious, Crispy Grilled Fish tonight!
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: Well then, how about it? Wanna join me in making this wish come true?
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A歪头}Actually, this is my first time wishing upon a meteor. Before, I always told my wishes to the wind, and when I saw a tumbleweed rolling across the prairie, that'd be a sign that my wish would come true...
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: I wonder... after tonight, will any undiscovered Islets appear? Or, perhaps... disappear?
info: 看流星雨-萨飞里闲聊_主流程文本3

content: So, I'm gonna wish for something huge this time. *ahem* I can't tell you what, yet... but I promise, when it comes true, I'll be the first to come celebrate with you.
